name: Little Timmy's Guide Dude (JamEdition)
description:
Guide a little robot called Timmy throughout a path of danger. Prevent him from falling into the deep pits of lava. This is your duty. Because you are Little Timmy's Guide. or as ı would like to call it :

Little

Timmy's

Guide

Dude

Thus LTGD.  (This was the best I came up with :)

HOW TO PLAY:

Click on the buttons to place the corresponding blocks into the game area.

Blue Block : Makes the character jump

Red Block: Makes the character dash

Green Block: Makes the character dash further

Wall Block: Spawns a wall (literally)

Don't forget that you've got limited number of blocks for each:

Blue: 10 Red: 10 Green: 5 Wall: 10
